Tata Consumer Products announced strong revenue growth for FY25, reaching ₹17,618 crore, a 16% year-on-year increase (9% organic growth).

Full-year EBITDA saw an 8% rise, reaching ₹2,502 crore.

Annual net profit grew by 6%, reaching ₹1,287 crore.

This performance showcased steady demand and successful operational expansion throughout the financial year.

The Board recommended a final dividend of ₹8.25 per equity share (825%) for FY25, subject to shareholder approval at the AGM.

The record date for determining dividend eligibility was set for May 29, 2025.

If approved, the dividend was to be paid on or after June 21, 2025.

Leading up to May 29, 2025, the market was focused on the upcoming record date for the dividend.

This likely generated investor interest in TATACONSUM shares.
